WHAT IS MFi ?

About the error message “This accessory may not be supported by device”:

The message would seem in the event you had been utilizing a non-mfi wall charger or in poor contact, however even if you’re utilizing an mfi accent, the error also can occur for the firmware drawback with iOS.

After evaluation, the causes of this drawback could be the following:

  • Device lightning port comprises impurities equivalent to fiber and particles, leading to poor contact.
  • The voltage of the wall charger is just too low or unstable, leading to inadequate energy provide.
  • The lightning finish is corroded/stained, leading to poor contact.
  • Circuit logic issues/system issues with charging tools.
  • The chip or mainboard of the cable is broken.

You can strive the next options:

  • You can use a pushpin to scrub out the pocket lint or particles from the charging port.
  • Wipe the Lightning finish with a tissue to take away grime and oxidation marks on the lightning finish.
  • Use the unique charger or MFi approved charger, as a result of some laptop computer USB output ports could have inadequate energy output.

If it nonetheless cannot repair the issue, please discover us, we’ll remedy your issues ASAP.
